mapper.insert: insert into post_table(iuser, title, ctnt, region, place, location_Y, location_X, cntFav, season) values(${iuser}, #{title}, #{ctnt}, ${region}, #{place}, #{location_Y}, #{location_X}, ${cntFav}, ${season})
mapper.select: SELECT A.*, B.img_addr, C.nickNM AS writer FROM post_table A INNER JOIN user_table C ON A.iuser=C.iuser LEFT JOIN post_img B ON A.iboard=B.iboard WHERE A.iboard=${iboard};
